scene_description_enriched: A bishop, identified by his mitre and crozier, stands in the foreground, blessing. He wears a blue cope adorned with gold dots and a red undergarment. To his left, three young boys are depicted kneeling in a wooden tub, their hands clasped in prayer. The background features a decorative gold and red diamond pattern, suggesting an interior setting, possibly within a church or a richly adorned room. The scene likely depicts a saint associated with the protection or martyrdom of children.
